snippet: For the small battalion of bankers and lawyers advising EADS and BAE Systems, the end of merger talks between the two aerospace giants brings no small amount of anguish over lost fees.
abstract: For the small battalion of bankers and lawyers advising EADS and BAE Systems, the end of merger talks between the two aerospace giants brings no small amount of anguish over lost fees.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Collapse of Aerospace Merger Deals Blow to Army of Advisers
